description: QueryFilter provides a simple way of providing complex filtering on IQueryable<> with dynamic expression trees. With one property, you can do multiple filters, contains, less than, not equals, etc for anything that implements IQueryable. This also works with Entity Framework. You get the ability to add grouping to your queries and and/or statements with a very simple syntax. Best of all, you only have to work with the filter properties. You simply send your filter object and the query you want to apply the .Where clause to and QueryFilter takes care of the rest! You can even deserialize JSON into your filter if you want the UI to be able to apply these complex filters!
releaseNotes: - Added Id field to FilterItems so Groups would still work with deserialized JSON
summary: QueryFilter provides way of creating complex filtering on IQueryable<> with dynamic expression trees in a simple way!
title: QueryFilter
